question: The S-400 air defence missile systems will be delivered to India by which country?
explanation:
The Deputy Chief of Mission of Russia, Roman Babushkin recently announced that all S-400 air defence missile systems will be delivered to India by the year 2025. He also added that Russia has started the production process of the S-400 missiles, which are to be delivered to India.
S-400 missile is an upgraded version of the S-300 missiles, which were available only to the Russian Defence forces, earlier. The missiles have been deployed in Russian forces since 2007. External Affairs Minister of India, Jai Shankar is set to visit Russia to attend the Russia-Indian-China trilateral meeting, to be held in March 2020.
